content: ** view this pattern for free here 1 ** ** watch the video tutorial here 2 ** this throw is an easy pattern worked from corner to corner a self striping yarn like safari from king cole is what really makes this design stand out the pattern is a simple repeat that you ll be able to sit back and relax with bulky yarn makes it work up super quick as well this pattern is designed to be about 50 square but you can adjust the size if you d like keep in mind this will change the amount of yarn needed i explain this best in the video tutorial the size will always be square this pattern is simply written without photos i have included a video tutorial you should know how to chain single_crochet half_double_crochet slip_stitch and single_crochet 2 together to be able to follow this pattern size approx 50 square yarn king cole safari 100% premium acrylic 311yds/150g bulky weight 7 balls in the shade wilderness hook k/6 5 mm hook or hook to obtain gauge 1 https //www ktandthesquid com/2022/11/14/how-to-crochet-the-locke-throw-free-crochet-pattern/ 2 https //youtu be/6pueidp40pe
